name: Race the Sun - An Infinite Speed Experience
blurb: Intense racing through infinite sandbox worlds. Includes community multiplayer and the Simplex World Creator. (PC/Mac/Linux)

rewards.reward: No Reward
THE GAMER (LIMITED): You get Race the Sun for PC/Mac at 20% off, plus one Flippfly Vote.
THE GAMER: You get Race the Sun for PC/Mac, plus one Flippfly Vote.
THE MUSIC LOVER: You get Race the Sun for PC/Mac, exclusive wallpapers, the 4-song soundtrack EP, plus one Flippfly Vote.
THE EARLY BIRD: You get all the benefits of "THE BETA TESTER" level at a discount!
THE BETA TESTER: You get Race the Sun for PC/Mac, exclusive wallpapers, the 4-song soundtrack, early access to mod tools & multiplayer, and our beta forums, as well as 2 total Flippfly Votes.
THE CREDIT: Everything in "THE BETA TESTER" level plus get your name in the Race the Sun Credits!...and 3 total Flippfly Votes.

THE CREDIT [UPDATED]: Everything in "THE BETA TESTER" level plus get your name in a Playable Credits Mode! (see update 10 for what this will look like)...and 3 total Flippfly Votes. \r\nNote: Everyone who has backed at "THE CREDIT" level will get this reward.

THE QUOTABLE: Everything in "THE CREDIT" level plus get your quote prominently displayed in Race the Sun! (must be appropriate of-course), an extra copy of the game and soundtrack for a friend ... and get the original game prototype (it ain\u2019t pretty).

THE REAL FAN: Everything in "THE QUOTABLE" level, plus get a beautiful 18"x24" printed poster (signed by us of-course), and 4 total Flippfly Votes. (please allow an extra 30 days for printed materials)

THE DEADLY OBJECT: Everything in "THE REAL FAN" level, plus name one of the deadly objects in Race the Sun. The name you give will become part of a player's epitaph when they die (see update #12 for pics). We will send a survey with the available objects to be named on a first-come, first-served basis. Names must be appropriate of-course. (please allow an extra 30 days for printed materials)

THE FOUNDER: Everything in "THE REAL FAN" level, plus join the Founder's Club which gets you a free copy of every game Flippfly ever makes for PC/Mac, a "Flippfly Founder" T-shirt, and 10 total Flippfly Votes. Also get your name in the credits of all of our games as a founder. (please allow an extra 30 days for printed materials)

THE FOUNDER [UPDATED]: Everything in "THE DEADLY OBJECT" level, plus a sweet backer T-shirt (designed by SamCube) AND join the Founder's Club which gets you a free copy of every game Flippfly ever makes for PC/Mac, a "Flippfly Founder" T-shirt, and 10 total Flippfly Votes. Also get your name in the credits of all of our games as a founder. Note: Everyone who has backed at "THE FOUNDER " level will get this reward.(please allow an extra 30 days for printed materials)

THE CONTRIBUTOR: Everything in "THE FOUNDER" level, plus design and name a decal for every player to use while customizing their ship. We will work with you to design an image or convert your logo to the style of Race the Sun. Want to add a decal for your Club, Company or Organization? This is the tier for you! (please allow an extra 30 days for printed materials)
THE COLLECTOR: Everything in "THE CONTRIBUTOR" level, plus a 3D printed model of the Race the Sun ship. (please allow an extra 30 days for printed materials)

THE CREATOR: Everything in "THE COLLECTOR" level, plus create one of the objects in Race the Sun. This could be a deadly object, or one that gets displayed at the start of a run. You can use the World Creator to make this object, or simply make a request and we will create it for you. Object must be appropriate of-course. (please allow an extra 30 days for printed materials)

THE PRODUCER: Everything in "THE MODEL" level, plus, you'll get to have 3 video chat sessions with us, where you'll get hands-on training with the mod tools, and an opportunity to tell us how to make them better for your specific dream-mod. We'll do everything we reasonably can to help your vision come to life! Also get a special mention in the credits as a producer, and get "producer" engraved on your 3D model. (please allow an extra 30 days for printed materials)

THE DESIGNER: Everything in "THE PRODUCER" level, plus work with us to model and texture a custom 3D ship for Race the Sun. Also get a 3D model of the ship you have designed engraved with your inscription. Also get a special mention in the credits as a designer.\r\n(please allow an extra 30 days for printed materials)

THE JAMMER: Everything in "THE COLLECTOR" level, plus spend a weekend game jamming with us! All you need is an idea and we will spend a weekend working on it together. And everything we create, code, images, graphics, & sounds are yours to use however you like. (Note: We could jam remotely, or you could get yourself  to central Wisconsin to jam in-person)
THE PATRON: Become our personal super hero and legend to our children and their children's children.... and of-course get any and all of the rewards included in previous tiers.
